text: Jaffrea is a genus of shrubs in the family Rhamnaceae. The genus is endemic to New Caledonia in the Pacific and contains two speciesHopkins, Helen C. F., Yohan Pillon, Elizabeth A. Stacy, and J. Kellermann. (2015) Jaffrea, a New Genus of Rhamnaceae Endemic to New Caledonia, with Notes on Alphitonia and Emmenosperma. Kew Bulletin 70, no. 4: 42. https://link.springer.com/article/10.1007/s12225-015-9593-6 that were first described in Alphitonia. It is related to Emmenosperma. == List of species == *Jaffrea erubescens *Jaffrea xerocarpa ==References== Category:Endemic flora of New Caledonia Category:Rhamnaceae Category:Rhamnaceae genera
title: Jaffrea
